original_body_lines: Mash 03-04 strawberries, in a container, until no lumps remain. Apply this paste directly to your face and let it sit for 10-12 minutes. Rinse it off with water. Apply this pack once, or twice, a week.

Remove the seed from 01 avocado and mash the avocado into a paste. Apply this paste on your face and let it sit for 10-12 minutes and then rinse it off with water. You can also massage your skin with slices of chilled avocado. Do this once a week.

Mix 01 tablespoon of aloe vera gel, or juice, and the white of one egg, to form a smooth paste. You can add 01 teaspoon of castor oil, if you wish to, or skip it. Massage this paste on your skin in a gentle, circular motion and let it sit for 20-30 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with cold water and pat dry. Apply this face pack twice a week.
Take a few drops of pure lemon juice and apply it to the areas with dark patches, blemishes, and age spots. Rinse it off after 10-15 minutes. Do this on a daily basis.

Gently rub a slice of ripe pineapple on your skin for about five minutes and then leave the juice on your face for 10 minutes. Then rinse it off with water. You need to do this two/three times a week.
